meanings.definition: Oleandomycins: a group of antibiotics used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oleandomycins to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took oleandomycins to get rid of the bacteria in her body.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the powerful oleandomycins!
meanings.sent4: Like warriors, oleandomycins battled the bacterial invaders.
meanings.sent5: The oleandomycins worked tirelessly to combat the infection.
